src:
Pesan Presiden FIFA untuk Kongres PSSI: Mari Bekerja Bersama demi Sepak Bola Indonesia
02 Nov 2019, 11:26 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI memiliki hajatan besar pada hari ini, Sabtu (2/11/2019) pagi. Bertempat di Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, PSSI menggelar Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) PSSI untuk menentukan siapa yang bakal menjadi pemimpin organisasi sepak bola tertinggi di Indonesia itu.
Dalam KLB PSSI ini, ada dua delegasi FIFA yang akan hadir, yakni Head of Member Association Governance Service, Luca Nicola dan Development Manager Southeast and East Asia, Lavin Vignesh.
Selain itu, ada juga perwakilan dari AFC, yakni Head of South Asia Unit AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Departemen, Purushottam Kattel, Manager of Asean Unit AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Departement, Nhodkeo Phawadee dan Secretary of AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Departement, Varankumar Sagaran.
Presiden FIFA, Gianni Infantino tak bisa hadir ke Indonesia. Namun pria berdarah Swiss-Italia tersebut mengirimkan pesan untuk kelancaran, kesuksesan dan harapan besar pada Kongres PSSI tahun ini. Berikut adalah pesan Presiden FIFA yang diunggah di akun resmi PSSI.
text:
FIFA President's Message to the PSSI Congress: Let's Work Together for Indonesian Football
02 Nov 2019, 11:26 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI has a big celebration today, Saturday (11/02/2019) morning. Located at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, PSSI held an Extraordinary Congress (KLB) PSSI to determine who would become the leader of the highest soccer organization in Indonesia.
In this PSSI KLB, there will be two FIFA delegates who will be present, namely the Head of Members of the Governance Service Association, Luca Nicola and Southeast and East Asia Development Manager, Lavin Vignesh.
In addition, there were also representatives from the AFC, namely the Head of South Asia Unit AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Department, Purushottam Kattel, Manager of Asean Unit AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Department, Nhodkeo Phawadee and Secretary of AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Department Department , Varankumar Sagaran.
FIFA President, Gianni Infantino could not attend Indonesia. But the Swiss-Italian man sent a message for the smoothness, success and great hopes at this year's PSSI Congress. The following is a message from FIFA President uploaded to the official PSSI account.
